main event: Four witnesses observed an unidentified flying object in Middleboro, Massachusetts on June 8, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as moving slowly at an altitude of 400-500 ft and maneuvered for about 5 minutes before disappearing., The witnesses reported seeing distinct colors: white-silver and red., The largest objects were bright and bluish-green in color., The speed and maneuverability of the objects were unlike any known aircraft or natural phenomena., No photographs were taken during the sightings.
witness description: various individuals, including an amateur astronomer
